title: OUAT Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 57 Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Odisha University of Agriculture & Technology (OUAT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 57 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation, and Ph.D. can apply for the OUAT Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
